name: OctoRhythm
description:
Are You Quick Enough to Keep Up?

OctoRhythm is a reaction-based rhythm game developed with the Leap Motion Controller in mind. Immerse yourself in 4 captivating game modes, Memorize symbols in sequence and repeat (or defeat) each gesture to a pulse-pounding background beat. It may start easy, but as the game progresses the difficulty can become insane!

Features
  • Unlock new levels & game modes as you play!
  • 4 game modes, totalling 48 levels! Can you get 3 stars on all of them?
  • Completely original soundtrack featuring 10 songs by composer Leo Perantoni!
  • Easy to learn, difficult to master!
  • Take advantage of the Leap's unique tracking capabilities!
Game Modes

Flow

  • In flow mode, you must match the symbols that flow in a stream with your hands. The more you get right, the better! Anyone can play, but can you get to 200 BPM?

Jo-Ken-Po

  • Similar to flow, but instead of matching the symbols, you must beat them in a Rock-Paper-Scissors match! If you've ever wanted to know what it's like to play Rock-Paper-Scissors with both hands 185 times a minute, this is the game mode for you!

Simon Says

  • In this mode, you must memorize a sequence of symbols and then repeat them to the beat. Test your memory and your skill!

Hardcore

  • Only for the strongest players: you must memorize the symbol sequence and beat it in a Rock-Paper-Scissors match! This task is not for the faint of heart!

Get the original soundtrack on Leo Perantoni's Bandcamp!
